topic.title: What's new in Release 16.1
topic.p: For Mingle onsite customers, please review the upgrade instructions before moving to Mingle 16.1

note.item: All of the features below are already available for our Mingle in the cloud customers.

section.title: Dependency history
section.p: Dependency events are now recorded in your project history as well as on the dependency pop up providing you and your team a record of all your dependencies.

section.title: Attachments in dependency pop up
section.p: Easily send and manage assets with dependencies. Files can now be uploaded to a dependency via drag and drop or click to upload.

section.title: Lazy load dependency tabs
section.p: To keep your dependency tab clean and allow you to focus on new and on going dependencies, we've hidden resolved dependencies. Under the resolved section, you will see the 5 most recently updated resolved dependencies. Anything after that will be hidden but can be shown by clicking on the 'Load More' button.

section.title: Dependency error notifications
section.p: Mingle will now alert you when a dependency has changed outside of your projects control. For instance, if you've raised a dependency on a project but that project gets deleted, Mingle will notify you that you will need to reassign the dependency to a new project.

section.title: Export/import dependencies
section.p: Provides you the ability to backup or transfer your dependencies from one Mingle site to another.

section.title: Attachments in card pop up
section.p: You can now upload, download, view, and delete attachments directly on the card pop up. We've added the attachments panel underneath card murmurs. This gives you the same attachment functionality in the card full view.

section.title: History in card pop up
section.p: History events will now be accessible in the card pop up. You'll be able to recall past events and view them directly from the card pop up and see them recorded as you make changes on the go.

section.title: Tab scroll
section.p: We've added a tab scroll for your project views; cleaning up your view and giving you a bit more extra space for your boards.

section.title: Sidebar text
section.p: We've made some changes to the sidebar text to provide more clarity on what options are available based on your view.

section.title: Bug fixes
section.p: The following bugs have been fixed with 16.1:

bullets.item: Fixed issue where duplicate dependency versions were being recorded in history when uploading multiple attachments.
Fixed issue where light users were not able to view dependency pop ups.
Fixed issue where dependency pop ups didn't trigger from search results.
Fixed issue where sorting by Raising User in dependency tab would throw an error.
Fixed issue where tags were being removed when users cancelled out of card edit mode.
Fixed issue where users couldn't assign a color to new tags in edit mode.
Fixed styling issue with "Select Tree" dropdown.
Fixed issue where downloading an attachment would also open attachment in new page.
Fixed issue where avatars on card face were not updating.
Fixed issue where card icon loading did not provide visual feedback.
Fixed issue where Special Headers page would throw an error.
Fixed issue where project templates did not maintain tab order when creating a new project.
Fixed issue where card wall would jump to the top after changing a property or dragging a card to a new column.
Fixed issue where macros would throw a syntax error when a property with a semi colon was used.
